channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 21:42 Air alarm to Sinelnikovsky District Surveat for Further Messages.
item.description: 游댮 21:42 Air alarm to Sinelnikovsky District Surveat for Further Messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 21:42 Flashing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider, anxiety is still in:- Manganese and Marganetsky territorial community- Chervono-Grigorivska Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 21:42 Flashing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider, anxiety is still in:- Manganese and Marganetsky territorial community- Chervono-Grigorivska Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 21:40 Auxiliary in Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv District-Lipetsk Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community
